      • ChallengeServlet

        @Autowired
public ChallengeServlet(com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.ChallengeService challengeService,
                                    com.revature.trial_by_combat.services.AvatarService avatarService)
        Database access dependency injection. ChallengeService, AvatarService dependency injection.
        Parameters:
        challengeService - calls the Challenge Data Access Object to interact with database.
        avatarService - calls the Avatar Service Data Access Object to interact with database.

      • createChallenge

        @PostMapping
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
 @ResponseBody
public com.revature.trial_by_combat.models.Challenge createChallenge(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                    com.revature.trial_by_combat.models.Challenge challenge)
                                                                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a Challenge in the database.
        Parameters:
        challenge - Challenge object to be persisted in database.
        Returns:
        Returns a copy of the persisted object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - "No challenge found to save to database.".
